description.value:
Geometric patterns are etched into the smooth brown-and-gray surface of a staff of earth, which makes a solid, resonant thud whenever tapped against the ground. While wielding a staff of earth, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and DC against effects that @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove] you or knock you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Scatter Scree]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pummeling Rubble]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Expeditious Excavation], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pummeling Rubble]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Earthbind], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shifting Sand]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
